Clojure, Ruby, Javascript, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS

Clojure, Ruby, Rails, C#, nginx, Postgresql, Mysql, MongoDB, Redis, AWS
Lead dev on Uswitch's credit card product. Took an ageing .Net platform and rewrote in Rails, increasing maintainability and pace of delivery.
Key member of energy back office team which revolutionised operational stability, rewriting a number of core apps in Clojure.
Ruby on Rails, Shopify, nginx, Postgresql, Mysql

This startup incubated with Uswitch's parent company was centred around targeting ultra-niche ppc terms around pet supplies, and testing consumer appetite by spinning up an online shop to serve those needs, drop-shipping products when ordered from Amazon. Sucessful shops became sites in their own right.  As a member of a small dev team (2-3), I was responsible for reacting to consumer demand, developing, opening and optimising sites based on interest, and improving the inventory management system when we eventually purchased a warehouse.
